=== Install the base system ===
After downloading and burning the appropriate CD for your system, boot the CD up and start the installation.

* Insert your Ubuntu Alternate Install Disk
* Install a '''Command Line System'''
* Choose your Language
* Choose your Country
* Choose a name for your machine
* Select your Keyboard Layout
* Partition the drive- ''this is at your discretion.  The Frontend will not require much space for itself, so a default partion and formatting scheme is fine.''
* Choose your Time Zone
* Choose a Username and password.
* Install the base System.
